explanation: BTC market sentiment is mixed but leans bullish on lower timeframes. Multiple users highlight price holding above 107k, mentions of trendline support on 4H, and expectations of higher targets (108500/109000). Some warn of bearish patterns (bear flag, inverted hammer), but many anticipate upward moves, with calls for buying on dips and scalping opportunities. Strong support is suggested at 106500. Daily close above 106500 is seen as bullish. A few suggest waiting for further confirmation, but short-term traders are actively taking long positions.
